attributes.action: Allow Drivers To Fine the Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more the drivers are fined for exceeding the speed limit wich is a good idea, however, we pay very high taxes on fuel and road: for this we the public demand a good service and traffic free roads.We should be able to fine the goverment should we not be able to drive quicker than 15mph. Fines are a good idea and should work both ways.
